commitMessage: @@@Implemented solution suggested by Adam Gent in his blog post: http://adamgent.com/post/30974973820/mybatis-sqlbuilder-rewritten .  as he was apparently horrified by the use of ThreadLocal.  As explained in the docs.  we were aware of the potential for this and the motivations.  but there's no reason why we can't offer both.
